body_html: Yes, right now the dataloader would behave incorrectly if the batch_size=1 and we have any transpose during data transformation. At least this was how I encountered the problem.
body_text: Yes, right now the dataloader would behave incorrectly if the batch_size=1 and we have any transpose during data transformation. At least this was how I encountered the problem.
body: Yes, right now the [dataloader](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py#L64) would behave incorrectly if the `batch_size=1` and we have any `transpose` during data transformation. At least this was how I encountered the problem.
